_pvp_info: Testing PC vs PC combat with free targeting. Players are actively hostile to each other.
_comment_scenario: Pure PvP scenario - competing for same resource with NO NPCs

dm._scenario_hint: Generate a zero-sum competitive scenario. Examples: Both bounty hunters tracking the SAME target (only one can claim the bounty), competing for unique artifact/data chip, last shuttle off-world (only one seat), contested salvage rights to valuable wreck, duel over faction honor. The key constraint: there is ONE thing they both need, and ONLY ONE can have it. They are the ONLY two people present - absolutely NO enemies, NO NPCs, NO gangs, NO civilians, NO bystanders. Just Kiran and Sable in direct opposition. DO NOT use [SPAWN_ENEMY] under any circumstances.

players.name: Kiran Voss
goals: Secure the objective before Sable Echo does
Defeat or neutralize the Nexus operative if necessary
Claim the prize - there can be only one winner

players.name: Sable Echo
goals: Secure the objective before Kiran Voss does
Detain or neutralize the Tempest operative if necessary
Claim the prize - there can be only one winner

notes: PVP test: Pure PC vs PC combat. With free_targeting_mode, each PC will see the other in their combatant list and must choose whether to attack. This tests: 1) Will they recognize they're targeting another PC? 2) Will they hesitate or engage? 3) Does friendly fire logging work correctly?
